Package assignment1.Action.sec304

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment1.Action.sec304.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OccasionalAction, RareAction, RegularAction
    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Action Superclass class that provides a catalog of actions to be carried out in view of COVID-19 OPH protocols.
    Since:
    11.0.14.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jie Meng
